metadata.name: Disting NT Community Gallery
metadata.description: Community-driven gallery for Disting NT plugins, tools, and resources

categories.name: Sequencers
categories.description: Drum machines, pattern generators, and sequencing tools

categories.name: Generators
categories.description: Oscillators, noise sources, and sound generators

categories.name: Creative
categories.description: Experimental and creative sound design tools

thorinside.name: Neal Sanche
thorinside.bio: Developer and contributor to the Disting NT ecosystem. Creator of NT Grids port.

expertsleepers.name: Expert Sleepers Ltd
expertsleepers.bio: Official Disting NT manufacturer and primary developer. Creator of the Disting NT platform.

fabianmartinez83.name: Fabian Martinez
fabianmartinez83.bio: Creative developer working on experimental Disting NT plugins and musical tools.

plugins.name: NT Grids
plugins.description: A port of Emilie Gillet's renowned Mutable Instruments Grids topographic drum sequencer for the Expert Sleepers Disting NT platform.
plugins.longDescription: This project brings the unique algorithmic drum pattern generation of the original Mutable Instruments Grids module to the Disting NT. Grids generates a variety of drum patterns based on continuous interpolation through a 'map' of patterns (Drum Mode) or using Euclidean algorithms (Euclidean Mode). Features two modes, three trigger outputs, accent output, clock input, reset input, and chaos control.
plugins.author: thorinside

plugins.name: Disting NT API
plugins.description: C++ API for the disting NT Eurorack module - essential development framework for creating custom plugins.
plugins.longDescription: The official C++ API and development framework for creating custom plugins for the Disting NT. This is a required dependency for building most Disting NT plugins and provides the core interfaces and utilities needed for plugin development.
plugins.author: expertsleepers

plugins.name: Disting NT Official Tools
plugins.description: Official tools and resources for the disting NT module including Lua scripts, 3pot tools, samples, and presets.
plugins.longDescription: The official collection of tools, scripts, samples, and presets for the Disting NT. Includes Lua scripts for custom algorithms, 3pot tools, sample libraries, preset collections, and various utilities for working with the Disting NT platform.
plugins.author: expertsleepers

plugins.name: Copier Maschine Clone
plugins.description: A creative sampling and manipulation tool inspired by classic copy machines, bringing unique sonic textures to the Disting NT.
plugins.longDescription: An experimental plugin that emulates the sonic characteristics of copy machines and document scanners, creating unique textures and rhythmic patterns from input audio. Features multiple copy modes, degradation controls, and rhythmic scanning patterns.
plugins.author: fabianmartinez83

plugins.name: Strummer
plugins.description: A guitar-like string synthesis and strumming pattern generator for creating realistic and expressive string instrument sounds.
plugins.longDescription: Strummer simulates the behavior of stringed instruments with realistic string physics, strumming patterns, and chord progressions. Features multiple string models, customizable strumming patterns, chord voicings, and expression controls for creating authentic guitar-like performances.
plugins.author: fabianmartinez83

plugins.name: I-Ching RND
plugins.description: A mystical random number generator based on the ancient Chinese I-Ching oracle system for creating evolving musical patterns.
plugins.longDescription: I-Ching RND uses the principles of the ancient Chinese I-Ching (Book of Changes) to generate random numbers and musical patterns. The algorithm creates evolving sequences based on hexagram transformations, providing a unique approach to generative music that balances randomness with philosophical structure.
plugins.author: fabianmartinez83

plugins.name: 3pot Tools Collection
plugins.description: Official collection of 3pot tools for the Disting NT - three-parameter control plugins for various utilities and effects.
plugins.longDescription: The official collection of 3pot (three-parameter) tools for the Disting NT. These lightweight plugins provide simple but powerful control over various parameters and can be used for modulation, utilities, and effects processing with just three knobs.
plugins.author: expertsleepers

plugins.name: Lua Scripts Collection
plugins.description: Official collection of Lua scripts for the Disting NT - programmable algorithms and utilities with full dependency support.
plugins.longDescription: The official collection of Lua scripts for the Disting NT platform. These scripts provide examples and utilities for creating custom algorithms, effects, and generators using the built-in Lua scripting system. Includes all supporting files and maintains directory structure for proper require() functionality.
plugins.author: expertsleepers

plugins.name: Handpan for NT
plugins.description: A realistic Handpan algorithm for the Disting NT that simulates the gentle, resonant sounds of a handpan instrument.
plugins.longDescription: Attempt to create a "realistic" Handpan algorithm for the Disting NT. This plugin simulates the behavior of a handpan instrument with realistic resonance and gentle playing characteristics. Features IN1 & IN2 for Gate inputs, IN3 & IN4 for Note CV inputs, OUT 1 & 2 for stereo output. CV controls include IN5 for base frequency, IN6 for decay, and IN7 for exciter. Designed to be played gently like a real handpan instrument, with smooth CV faders recommended for optimal performance.
plugins.author: fabianmartinez83
